title: What is PVR? The efficiency metric that predicted Jokić's MVP

hook.text:
This metric predicted Nikola Jokić's MVP 3 years before anyone else saw it coming.

[On-screen: "THE METRIC THAT KNEW 🏆"]

It's called PVR. And it's about to change how you watch basketball.

explanation.text:
PVR = Production-to-Volume Ratio. How many points you GENERATE per possession you USE.

[Show formula: (PTS + AST×Mult) / (FGA + TOV + FTA×0.44 + AST) - 1] × 100

TS% only counts your own scoring. PVR counts assists - the points you CREATE for teammates.

High PVR = elite efficiency. You're not just scoring, you're making everyone better.

example.text:
Jokić 2021-22: 44.54 PVR - HIGHEST in the top 15 all-time.

[Show: Curry 40.27, Magic 44.03, Jokić 44.54]

He scored 27 PPG + 8 APG with zero wasted possessions. That's MVP-level efficiency.
